install.name: S5 Drop Down Cart
install.author: Shape 5
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Shape 5 LLC. All rights reserved.
install.description: Updated to include AJAX support. Shows cart price and quantity, individual cart items are visible when button is clicked. By Shape5.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: backcolor
param.label: Drop Down Background Color
param.description: Enter the HEX color you would like the dropdown back to be

param.name: bordercolor
param.label: Drop Down Border Color
param.description: Enter the HEX color you would like the dropdown border to be

param.name: backfontcolor
param.label: Drop Down Font Color
param.description: This is font color displayed for the items in your cart when the drop down appears

param.name: fontcolor
param.label: Box Font Color
param.description: This is font color displayed for your items and intro text

param.name: introtext
param.label: Title Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed at the top of the cart

param.name: button1text
param.label: Show Cart Button Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed for the first button

param.name: button2text
param.label: Expand Drop Down Button Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed for the second button

param.name: button2textclicked
param.label: Close Drop Down Button Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed for the second button when it is clicked

param.name: individual_price
param.label: Individual Price Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed for the Individual Price

param.name: order_total
param.label: Order Total Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed for the Order Total

param.name: items
param.label: Items Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed for the Items

param.name: openclose
param.label: Open The Drop Down When An Item Is Added?

param.name: scroll
param.label: Scroll The Page To The Top When An Item Is Added?
